definition: the theory of Mencius that people are by nature good
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: The theory of benevolent governance is based on the conception of primary kindness.
sentences.chinese: “仁政”思想的理论基础是“性善”论。

sentences.english: This can also be called "the theory of good nature".
sentences.chinese: 这也可以表述为“性善论”。

sentences.english: Human nature tend towards good , just as water tends to flow downward.
sentences.chinese: 人之性善也，犹如水之就下也。

sentences.english: Good-nature is the direct ground of Neisheng.
sentences.chinese: 内圣的直接根据是性善。

sentences.english: The third part focuses on Giulio Aleni's mediation of Confucius argument that nature is good.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分主要探讨艾儒略对儒家性善论的调和。

sentences.english: It is thus clear that "man's Quality is good" is a theoretical foundation stone of Confucius' theory.
sentences.chinese: 可见，“性善论”乃是构建孔子学说的理论基石。
